name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MailPro - Write entire mail with AI.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An automatic email generator and email tracking tool.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that generates emails based on user input and it works on Gmail and other websites can be a useful tool for those who frequently send emails. This extension can save time and effort by automating the process of composing and sending emails, and can also help to improve the accuracy and consistency of the emails.
